info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 14 at 11:57AM EDT until June 14 at 12:45PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1230 PM EDT FOR WESTERN WARREN...NORTHEASTERN HANCOCK...SOUTHEASTERN GREENE AND TALIAFERRO COUNTIES... At 1156 AM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Crawfordville, moving south at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Crawfordville, White Plains, Siloam, Norwood, Sharon, Liberty, Springfield, Robinson, Jewell, Mayfield, Daniel Springs, Powelton, Barnett, Lyneville, Raytown, Alexander Stephens Park, Sandy Cross, Culverton and Shoals. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
